Today in County Clare, it's looking good with 10 ft @ 13s W swell and a fresh 16 mph SSW wind. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering fun waves throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 12 ft @ 13s W swell but fresh 19 mph W winds will make it poor across the board. Day after, still poor with 6 ft @ 10s W swell and 22 mph WNW winds. Best: today.
